SEARCH
Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.app

Class Game

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.app.Game
public class Game extends Object
This class is the core class of the whole game, it creates and manages all subcomponents.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Creates a new instance of the game. Loads the newest incomplete save if one exists, else level 1.
      Parameters:
      stage - The stage created by the application window.

    • Game

      public Game(int level)
      Create the game with a specific level on startup, used only by Fuzzing and Testing modules.
      Parameters:
      level - the number of the level to load;

  • Method Details

      Parameters:
      level - the level that was recorded.

    • stopRecordingPlayback

      Parameters:
      playback - the Playback instance that has stopped.
